CREATE TABLE Skill 
    (
     SkillId INTEGER NOT NULL IDENTITY NOT FOR REPLICATION , 
     SkillName VARCHAR (60) NOT NULL , 
     UserId INTEGER NOT NULL 
    )
GO

ALTER TABLE Skill ADD CONSTRAINT Skill_PK PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (SkillId)
     WITH (
     ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON , 
     ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON )
GO

CREATE TABLE "User" 
    (
     UserId INTEGER NOT NULL IDENTITY NOT FOR REPLICATION , 
     FullName VARCHAR (60) NOT NULL , 
     Email VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL , 
     GithubLink VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL , 
     LinkedInName VARCHAR (60) , 
     Phone INTEGER NOT NULL , 
     Description VARCHAR (1000) NOT NULL 
    )
GO

ALTER TABLE "User" ADD CONSTRAINT User_PK PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (UserId)
     WITH (
     ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON , 
     ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON )
GO

ALTER TABLE Skill 
    ADD CONSTRAINT TABLE_2_User_FK FOREIGN KEY 
    ( 
     UserId
    ) 
    REFERENCES ""User"" 
    ( 
     UserId 
    ) 
    ON DELETE NO ACTION 
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION 
GO
